page.title: 15CLUBS AND EVENTS
page.content: Over 40 clubs exist in the Thorhill area. These cater for a great variety of tastes but fall into 4 main classes :- sporting clubs eg fishing, squash and tennis; Youth clubs eg scouts; Debating clubs including Young Farmers, Rotary Club, WRI and craft clubs such as dress making, fly tying and crook making. Five years ago the school offered the use of its premises and equipment at low cost to these clubs during the winter season and now, any week-day night the school is bustling with adult education classes. Several clubs join the Community Council in organising the annual Thornhill Gala during the second week of July. After crowning the "Queen", activities during that week include street parties, stunt riding, pipe band displays, float processions, street busking and various contests.
